channel.title: Need help connecting to my server please
channel.description:
i have done all the correct variable setting as far as i know because i can run my server and also run my client but when i try to connect to it it simply keeps saying "error connecting to server" i have also downloaded and have the no-ip duct running too and have the check marks in the boxes.
i also shut my firewall off for right now too
please help me i dont know what the problem could be
thanks,smerf45[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 31, 2009, 02:11:51 pm[/size][hr]i also forgot to say that i dont need to port forward so its not that either

item.title: Need help connecting to my server please
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

ok if you havent ever port forwarded then your old pc was set with a static ip that let it through the router, wat you wil have to do now is give vista a static ip (ex. 192.168.2.45) and port forward port 43594 on ip 192.168.2.45. it should work then

Read full topic
